thread.title: Jeanne Schneider
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Jeanne Schneider

author: Jeanne Schneider
title: Jeanne Schneider
text: I had a very, very, bad experience with another storage facility. I was extremely frustrated about it. I explained to Cheyenne what I had been going through. She was empathetic , patient, gave me lots 8f options, answered all my silly questions, made extra copies etc & even sold me boxes I know I won't use now. She did all of this with a wonderful warm smile..
